nodes.text: Exodeen was a planet located in the Colonies along the Hydian Way.
Exodeen was the first major occupied world in a string of planets of the Colonies encountered on the Hydian's route, followed by Boudolayz, Herzob, Besnia, and Koensayr.
The planet was home to a non-humanoid species known as the Exodeenians who had six arms, six legs, and six rows of uneven teeth.

Exodeen was located in the middle of Imperial territory circa the Galactic Civil War. While some Exodeenians served within the bureaucracy of the Empire, others were members of the Alliance to Restore the Republic.

Exodeen was represented in the New Republic Senate by senior senator M'yet Luure, a secondary senator, and finally junior senator R'yet Coome. The world later fell to the Yuuzhan Vong during their invasion.
